snippet.title: Heartwood Heroes - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Available on Steam March 27: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1866120/Heartwood_Heroes/
Follow @Ludosity on twitter for more updates and news about Heartwood Heroes! https://twitter.com/ludosity

Welcome to Heartwood Heroes, a fast-paced board game for up to 4 players! Featuring humorous quests, quick turn-based combat and multiple-choice events. Explore the board, equip your character, get a job, and fight to become Hero of the Week! Play locally or online with Steam Remote Play - only one copy of the game needed. Make your own quests and characters via the Steam Workshop.

Heartwood Heroes will normally cost $11.99 USD, but at launch there will be a 15% discount!
